attributes.action: CREATE A GRANT FOR YOUNG PEOPLE WHO DO NOT WANT TO BUY THEIR FIRST PROPERTY BUT RENT PROPERTY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I HAVE BEEN LOOKING IN TO MOVING OUT OF HOME WITH FRIENDS BUT IT IS SO EXPENSIVE ESPECIALLY IF YOU ARE ON A LOW INCOME. I BELIEVE THAT IS NOT RIGHT THAT ONLY UNEMPLOYED, HOMELESS OR EXPECTANT PARENTS HAVE THE RIGHT TO HELP WITH HOUSING. I BELIEVE THAT THERE SHOULD BE SOME HELP FROM THE GOVERMENT TO HELP PEOPLE WITH RENTING THEIR FIRST PROPERTY.

rejection.details: Please do not write in capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
